none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 23, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 This is some nasty nasty shit, and I am here for it. Two short EPs crammed onto one cassette, and there's now more Hungarian black metal/core in my ears than I ever knew I wanted....and oh fuck me do I want it. DEGENERÁLT, FAJ // MMXX
